aka: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner
awards:
第30届上海电视节白玉兰奖(2025)
　　纪录片 最佳系列纪录片(提名)
trans_title: 爱尔兰：野性之岛 第一季
Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner
introduction: Board a stunning 140-year-old traditional sailboat and glide around Ireland’s Atlantic islands with host Eoin Warner. Spot throngs of basking sharks, frolicking humpback whales, warring grey seals, and many more of the country’s untamed wonders.S1 E1 - Sea of SerpentsS1 E2 - Edge of the AbyssS1 E3 - Echoes of the PastProduction companies: Blue Ant Media, Crossing The Line Films
chinese_title: 爱尔兰：野性之岛 第一季
